name: F-35 Lightning II, Modern Combat Sim: Single Player and MMOG
blurb: From Wild Bill Stealey, of MicroProse and F-19 Stealth Fighter game fame, comes F-35 Lightning II, a Modern Combat Sim Flying MMOG!

rewards.reward:
Receive a Free Copy of F-35 Lightning II, Single Player/MMO game as a Digital Download.
 
Receive your $ contribution in FREE Defense Credits for use in F-35 MMO Play.

Use your contribution dollars NOW for Defense Credits for play in the currently operating FREE MMOs, www.Combined-Arms.com or www.M4TankBrigade.com. 

Get Listed in the Credits as a Contributor to the F-35 Development Team.
Rewards above and;\r\nReceive NOW Two Free Months of Premium WarBirds, www.TotalSims.com, MMO play,   (www.Totalsims.com).  A $49.90 value.

Rewards above:

Receive Now Three Free Months of Premium WarBirds MMO play, (www.Totalsims.com) now.
 
Participate in the closed beta, when available, where you can play the unfinished game and help us improve it before the rest of the customers get to!

Rewards above;
 
Get a FREE “Kill Bill” T-shirt from www.Totalsims.com.

Get listed on the “Kill Bill” webpage.

Participate on the Play Testing Team and get credit on the Playtesting Team Credits Page in the F-35 Lightning II Simulation.

Rewards above;

Get a Free F-35 Lightning II WarBirds T-Shirt with your ingame “handle” on it.

Raise your FREE WarBirds award to Five Months of FREE Premium WarBirds MMO play, (www.Totalsims.com) now.

Receive an extra game & beta key for a friend who will get credit for half your Contribution in Defense Credits for any of IENT’s FREE MMOs.

Get Listed in the Credits as a Special Contributor to the F-35 Development Team.

Rewards above and;
               
Receive a Free F-35 WarBirds Golf Shirt.

Raise your FREE WarBirds award to Six Months of FREE Premium WarBirds MMO play, (www.Totalsims.com) now.

Your in game “handle” placed in the game as names of the AI players in the single player game and in the MMO AI.

Rewards above and;
Receive Now Twelve Months of FREE Premium WarBirds MMO play, (www.Totalsims.com) now.

Work with us to create a custom online event that will appear in the F-35 Simulation based on your ideas.

The Event will carry your name or handle as the Executive Producer of the Event.

You will have the opportunity to be the Event Commander one of the competing teams in the Event.  You are the General responsible for winning or losing!

Your Event will be "Saved" to be used periodically in the MMO//Min once per year for 3 years

Get Listed in the Credits as a Silver Contributor to the F-35 Development Team.

Rewards above and;
    Receive Now a Two Full Years of Free Premium WarBirds MMO play, (www.Totalsims.com) now.
Get Listed in the Credits as a Silver Contributor to the F-35 Development Team.
Full F-35 Lightning II Instruction Manual and Four Hours of FREE ONINE Flight instruction in either F-35 Lightning II when complete or Now in WarBirds from www.TotalSims.com.
Your own Special Ingame paint job for your F-35 Lightning II with our name and handle painted on one if the F-35 II aircraft.

In addition to the above rewards, a very special thanks in the game credits and our eternal gratitude.
The first 4 persons to pledge $1000 will also receive an original framed art of the F-35 Signed by the Developers.
   
Receive Now Five FREE Years of Premium WarBirds MMO play, (www.Totalsims.com) now.

Get Listed in the Credits as a Gold Contributor to the F-35 Development Team.
Get your handle listed permanently in the High Score Screens of F-35 Lightning II.

Free Premium WarBirds MMO for 10 Years.\r\nAnd, we'll fly you to North Carolina at the Famous Mountain Air Country Club resort (www.mountainaircountryclub.com) for a Defense Briefing on the F-35 Lightning II from a retired Air Force Three Star General, a round of golf with the General and Wild Bill, and dinner at the country club for you and a guest.\r\nWe will make your North Carolina trip even better with a long weekend, 2 rounds of golf, and a flight lesson with one of the members of the Mountain Air Pilots Association.

In Addition to the Trip to www.MountainAirCountryClub.com described above, we will provide the contributor with a seat on our Board of Advisory Directors to assist us making other great simulation games.
